tiles.title: OMS Linux Population Trend
tiles.query:
//OMS Linux Population Trend

union (cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshotOld | where Date < datetime(2020-06-28)), cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot
| summarize DailyCount = count() by Date
| summarize MonthlyMax = max(DailyCount) by endofmonth(Date)
| render timechart

tiles.title: OMS Windows Population Trend
tiles.query:
//OMS Windows Population Trend

cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot
| summarize DailyCount = count() by Date
| summarize MonthlyMax = max(DailyCount) by endofmonth(Date)

tiles.title: Top 50 customers of OMS based off agent count
tiles.query:
//Top customers OMS by AgentId Count

let WorkspaceOS = union
        Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot),
        Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
    | extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
    | summarize
        HasWindows = countif(OSType == "Windows") > 0,
        HasLinux = countif(OSType == "Linux") > 0
        by WorkspaceId;
let topCustomerId =
union
    Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot),
    Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
| join kind = leftouter WorkspaceOS on WorkspaceId
| extend Id = tostring(split(ResourceId, "/")[2])
| where Id != ""
| summarize
    TotalAgentCount = dcount(AgentId),
    WinAgentCount = dcountif(AgentId, OSType == "Windows"),
    LnxAgentCount = dcountif(AgentId, OSType == "Linux") by Id
| sort by TotalAgentCount desc
| take 50;
topCustomerId
| join kind = leftouter cluster('genevareference.westcentralus.kusto.windows.net').database('AzureGraph').
Customer_Subscription on Id
| project Name, TotalAgentCount, WinAgentCount, LnxAgentCount, SubscriptionId = Id, Id = CloudCustomer
| join kind = leftouter cluster('genevareference.westcentralus.kusto.windows.net').database('AzureGraph').
Customer_CloudCustomer on Id
| project Name, SubscriptionId, TotalAgentCount, WinAgentCount, LnxAgentCount, IndustryName
| sort by TotalAgentCount

tiles.title: Top 50 customers of AMA based off agent count
tiles.query:
//AMA top customers
union
    cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WinAMADailySnapshot,
    cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LnxAMADailySnapshot
| summarize
    TotalAgentCount = dcount(VMId), 
    WinAgentCount = dcountif(VMId, OsType == "windows"),
    LnxAgentCount = dcountif(VMId, OsType == "linux")
    by SubscriptionId
| take 50
| extend Id = SubscriptionId
| join kind = leftouter cluster('genevareference.westcentralus.kusto.windows.net').database('AzureGraph').
Customer_Subscription on Id
| project Name, TotalAgentCount, WinAgentCount, LnxAgentCount, SubscriptionId = Id, Id = CloudCustomer
| join kind = leftouter cluster('genevareference.westcentralus.kusto.windows.net').database('AzureGraph').
Customer_CloudCustomer on Id
| project Name, SubscriptionId, TotalAgentCount, WinAgentCount, LnxAgentCount, IndustryName
| sort by TotalAgentCount, WinAgentCount, LnxAgentCount, IndustryName
| sort by TotalAgentCount

tiles.title: Agents deployed (AMA vs MMA) by customer
tiles.query:
//Top customers OMS by AgentId Count

let WorkspaceOS = union
        Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot),
        Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
    | extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
    | summarize
        HasWindows = countif(OSType == "Windows") > 0,
        HasLinux = countif(OSType == "Linux") > 0
        by WorkspaceId;
let CustomerOMSAgents =
union
    Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot),
    Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
| join kind = leftouter WorkspaceOS on WorkspaceId
| extend SubscriptionId = tostring(split(ResourceId, "/")[2])
| where isempty(['CustomerSelect']) or SubscriptionId == ['CustomerSelect'] // Freetext filtering
| summarize total_MMA_Agents = dcount(AgentId) by SubscriptionId;
let CustomerAMAAgents = union
    cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WinAMADailySnapshot,
    cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LnxAMADailySnapshot
| where isempty(['CustomerSelect']) or SubscriptionId == ['CustomerSelect'] // Freetext filtering
| summarize
    Total_AMA_Count = dcount(VMId) by SubscriptionId;
CustomerOMSAgents
| join kind=fullouter CustomerAMAAgents on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId1

tiles.title: Solutions used on MMA by number of agents
tiles.query:
//Top customers OMS by AgentId Count

let WorkspaceOS = union
        Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot),
        Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
    | extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
    | summarize
        HasWindows = countif(OSType == "Windows") > 0,
        HasLinux = countif(OSType == "Linux") > 0
        by WorkspaceId;
let CustomerOMSSolutions =
union
    Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot),
    Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows"), Solution = Solutions
| join kind = leftouter WorkspaceOS on WorkspaceId
| extend SubscriptionId = tostring(split(ResourceId, "/")[2])
| where isempty(['CustomerSelect']) or SubscriptionId == ['CustomerSelect'] // Freetext filtering
| mv-expand Solution to typeof(string)
| where Solution != "null"
| summarize AgentCount = dcount(AgentId) by Solution
| where AgentCount > 0
| sort by AgentCount desc;
CustomerOMSSolutions

tiles.title: Customers using solution
tiles.query:
//Customers that use the solutions
let WorkspaceOS = union
        Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot),
        Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
    | extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
    | summarize
        HasWindows = countif(OSType == "Windows") > 0,
        HasLinux = countif(OSType == "Linux") > 0
        by WorkspaceId;
let SolutionOMSCustomers =
union
    Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot),
    Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows"), Solution = Solutions
| join kind = leftouter WorkspaceOS on WorkspaceId
| extend SubscriptionId = tostring(split(ResourceId, "/")[2])
| where isempty(['SolutionSelect']) or Solution has ['SolutionSelect'] // Freetext filtering
| summarize AgentCount = dcount(AgentId) by SubscriptionId
| where AgentCount > 0
| sort by AgentCount desc;
SolutionOMSCustomers
